text:
Surprising Encounters

A lively restaurant, Raskolnikov and Zametov meet.  
Raskolnikov: “What, you here? Razumihin said you were gone!”  

Zametov: “I’ve been to see you!”  

Raskolnikov: “I know. You looked for my sock?”  

---  

Same scene, Raskolnikov smirking slightly.  
Raskolnikov: “Razumihin’s smitten with you, you know.”  

Zametov: “What a hot head he is!”  

Raskolnikov: “Who’s been pouring champagne into you?”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov encounters Zametov in a restaurant, revealing a mix of humor and irritation in their conversation.
